column5: All of the smaller lakes along the highway between here and Winnipeg are open now, still some ice out there on Wabigoon but the shores are opening up now and the ice is in rough shape, not long now. With the open water on our shore my puppy got to try out his new camera harness this afternoon, I challenge you not to smile at this video!https://youtu.be/Ildz9i3Llk4
As always; great video. It definitely will not be long now until the ice is gone in the main body of Wabigoon. Thanks for the fun reports.
Yup, not long now! Thanks for the reply, always good to know people are liking the vids
Interesting "dog's eye" view. He's a natural.
Very cool thanks for sharing.Next you can strap the camera to a walleye that you release!
Hmmmmmmm now there's a really good idea! Wouldn't that be cool!
Smiled all the way through it.great.think puppy thouroghly enjoyed it.getting boat ready as we speak.got to get out soon.been a while.
I hear ya about getting out soon. I was all packed this afternoon for some shore fishing splake, never happened, too much other stuff came up .this Wednesday for sure!
